name: DOM (Noah2000)
description:
This is a little Doom 1993 "Clone". I made it for the "Indie Game Dev Beginners #002" by nerdifex. I made this little Demo in 3-4 days so please let me know if you find any bugs or have some tipps. I made all the sprites , music and scripts myself in unity.

Controlls:

WASD = Move

Left Mouse Click = shoot

With the horizontal axis of the mouse you can look horizontaly

To pick up a item just walk Over it

esc = settings (there you can change the fov , sensitivity and music)
